name: Lights Out (itch) (Shafournee)
description:
Your dad’s been gone for a while, huh? Maybe you should go looking for him… Whatever you do, watch your back and DON’T let your candle go out!

Controls:

A/D: Move

E: Drop or Pick up Candle

Space: Climb on box, and jump off box

Made by Allyson [BossCoffeeCake], Andrew [Saruto] and Shane [Shafournee] for Ludum Dare 46 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/lights-out-3
